  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/4902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/4902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La vinya i el vi</string>
            <string language="en">Vineyards and wines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weinberge und Weine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vignes et vins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vinhedos e vinhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vigne e vini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμπελώνες και κρασιά</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica sobre la cultura de la vinya i el vi en tots els seus vessants:  cultural, social, històric i econòmic. Conté una proposta d'activitats i de criteris d'avaluació i un dossier didàctic per al professorat.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching resource on the world of vineyards and wines as seen from different points of view: cultural, social, historic and economic. It includes activities, assessment criteria and a teacher's guide.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">agricultura</string>
            <string language="en">agriculture</string>
            <string language="es">agricultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gestió empresarial</string>
            <string language="en">business management</string>
            <string language="es">gestión empresarial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">identitat cultural</string>
            <string language="en">cultural identity</string>
            <string language="es">identidad cultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia alimentària</string>
            <string language="en">food technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnología alimentaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sistema de producció</string>
            <string language="en">production system</string>
            <string language="es">sistema de producción</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtendes Hilfsmittel auf der Welt der 
Weinberge und der Weine, wie von den unterschiedlichen Punkten der 
Ansicht gesehen: kulturell, sozial, historisch und ökonomisch. 
Sie schließt Aktivitäten, Einschätzung Kriterien und die 
Anleitung eines Lehrers ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource d'enseignement sur le monde des vignes 
et des vins comme vu de différents points de vue : culturel, 
social, historique et économique. Elle inclut des activités, 
des critères d'évaluation et le guide d'un professeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso ensinando no mundo dos vinhedos e dos 
vinhos como visto dos pontos diferentes da vista: cultural, 
social, historic e econômico. Inclui atividades, critérios da 
avaliação e guia de um professor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa d'istruzione sul mondo delle vigne e dei 
vini come visto dai punti differenti della vista: culturale, 
sociale, storico ed economico. Include le attività, i test di 
verifica di valutazione e la guida dell'insegnante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς διδασκαλίας στον κόσμο των 
αμπελώνων και των κρασιών όπως βλέπει από τις 
διαφορετικές απόψεις: πολιτιστικός, κοινωνικός, ιστορικός 
και οικονομικός. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες, τα 
κριτήρια αξιολόγησης και τον οδηγό ενός δασκάλου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landwirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unternehmensführung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kulturelle Identität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmitteltechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produktion System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">agriculture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système de production</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema di produzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
